host.description: Host name or IP adress to the MSE machine

restPort.description: Port number to the REST interface (optional)

wsPort.description: Port number to the web-sockets interface (optional)

engineRestPort.description: Port number to the REST interfaces of Viz Engines (optional)

profile.description: Identifier of the "profile" to send commands to

playlistID.description: Identifier of the "playlist" to send commands to

preloadAllElements.description: Whether all elements should be preloaded or not

purgeUnknownElements.sofieTitle: Purge unknown/unused element from Viz Rundown upon activate
purgeUnknownElements.description: Whether unknown elements should be purged from the rundown upon activation

autoLoadInternalElements.sofieTitle: Automatically load internal elements when added
autoLoadInternalElements.description: Whether internal elements should automatically be loaded when added to expectedPlayoutItems

clearAllTemplateName.description:
It is a common practice to have an element which only purpose is to "clear all graphics" on the vizEngine.
To use this in TSR, set a reference to that here

clearAllOnMakeReady.description: Whether to trigger a clear all templates upon makeReady

dontDeactivateOnStandDown.description: If true, the rundown won't be deactivated on standdown

onlyPreloadActivePlaylist.sofieTitle: Only preload elements in active Playlist
onlyPreloadActivePlaylist.description: If true, only elements in the currently active rundown will be loaded

clearAllCommands.description: List of commands to be sent to Viz Engines in order to fully clear them
